content: welcome to pawsome pup pullover this sweater is knitted top down it s a basic kid s sweater which has a button band on front so it s easy to slip through but it has still a good fit around the neck this design has a round yoke and it s gradually increased till the sweater got the desired bust circumference after reaching the desired yoke depth the sleeves are separated from the body and then knitted to the stated length of sleeves and body the dog pattern is not a must so you can decide if it fits to the personal style you can make it plain or with stripes this instruction should give you the basic form so you can adapt for your child s desire every child has a different body my son is 3 years old but weighs only 13 kg and has a slim body i chose to make the size of 2 years old just make the sleeves and the body longer generally the sizes are calculated so that it fits the oldest size in the size range so if you child is 6 years old maybe the 4-5 years old could fit better that 6-7 years old pls look at the measurements and pick the size which fits best to your child s measurements **size** 1y 2y 3y 4-5y 6-7y 8-10y circumference of the finished sweater 54 63 68 72 77 82 cm 22 25 28 18 31 33 pick a size with 5-10cm positive ease **gauge** 26sts x 36 row in stockinette with 3mm needle the sts gauge is rather important than the row gauge **yarn** fin merino by svärta faret 235/50g grey 2 3 3 3 4 4 skein brushed alpaca silk by drops design light purple 1 skein for the doggy pattern the yarn i used is to be hand washed you can use any other yarn which meets the gauge **notions** 2 5mm & 3mm needle 3 ists markers scrap yarn or st holder tapestry needle 3 buttons
